products.title: Alessi Snow White 89mm Vertical Blind

products.productdescription:
Their alessi range is a great purchase for a room, the very affordable polyester verical blinds come in 5 vibrant colours.Textured fabric of this whitevertical blind is an excellent choice for your space.
